# Scope ğŸ”­

Where variables are visible.

## Global Scope
Variables outside any function. Accessible everywhere.

## Function Scope
Variables inside a function. Not accessible outside.

```javascript
function test() {
  let secret = 123;
}
console.log(secret); // Error: secret is not defined
```

## Block Scope (let/const)
Variables inside `{}` (like if-statements or loops).
